text:
Remember Priya Prakash Varrier? The wink sensation that became a national crush after her video from Oru Adaar Love went viral? It was all over the internet, not for days but months!
Twitter
Yesterday, her kissing scene from the same movie also went viral. The movie is grabbing a lot of eyeballs, it seems.
But do you know that more people are looking forward to this movie than Ranveer Singh’s Gully Boy?
Ranveer Singh’s ‘Apna Time Ayega’ is also viral now. The fever has also gripped International artist DJ Diplo.
However, according to Most Anticipated Indian Films and Shows list on IMDb, Oru Adaar Love is at the top spot. Gully Boy is on the second spot.
Don't Miss 185 SHARES 544 SHARES 411 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES
Interestingly, both the movies are slated to release on Feb 14. Which are you going to watch? Tell us in the comments section below.
title: Not Ranveer's Gully Boy, Priya Varrier's Oru Adaar Love Is The 'Most Anticipated Indian Film'!
description: do you know that more people are looking forward to the movie than people wanting to watch Ranveer Singh’s Gully Boy. However, according to Most Anticipated Indian Films and Shows list on IMDb, Oru Adaar Love is at the top spot. Gully Boy is on the second spot. Interestingly, both the movies are slated to release on Feb 14. Which are you going to watch?
